      PacketCaptureRequest.Builder setCappoint(String cappoint)
      Possible values are: PacketCaptureRequest.CAPPOINT_VNIC, PacketCaptureRequest.CAPPOINT_VMKNIC, PacketCaptureRequest.CAPPOINT_VMNIC, PacketCaptureRequest.CAPPOINT_VDRPORT, PacketCaptureRequest.CAPPOINT_DVFILTER, PacketCaptureRequest.CAPPOINT_LOGICALPORT, PacketCaptureRequest.CAPPOINT_FCPORT, PacketCaptureRequest.CAPPOINT_VIF, PacketCaptureRequest.CAPPOINT_PNIC, Define the point to capture data.

      Define the rate of packet capture process.
      PacketCaptureRequest.Builder setCapsnaplen(Long capsnaplen)
      Limit the number of bytes captured from each packet.
      PacketCaptureRequest.Builder setCapsource(String capsource)
      Possible values are: PacketCaptureRequest.CAPSOURCE_CLI, PacketCaptureRequest.CAPSOURCE_UI, This type is used to differenite the incoming request from CLI/UI.
      PacketCaptureRequest.Builder setCapvalue(String capvalue)
      Define the capture value of given capture point.
      PacketCaptureRequest.Builder setDirection(String direction)
      Possible values are: PacketCaptureRequest.DIRECTION_INPUT, PacketCaptureRequest.DIRECTION_OUTPUT, PacketCaptureRequest.DIRECTION_DUAL, Define the capture direction.

      Possible values are: PacketCaptureRequest.FILTERTYPE_PRE, PacketCaptureRequest.FILTERTYPE_POST, Define the capture filter type.

      Define the transport node to capture data.

      Define the transport node to capture data.

      Define the packet capture additional options to filter the capture data.
      PacketCaptureRequest.Builder setStreamaddress(String streamaddress)
      Set the stream address to receive the capture packet.
      PacketCaptureRequest.Builder setStreamport(Long streamport)
      Set the stream port to receive the capture packet.

      • setCapduration

        public PacketCaptureRequest.Builder setCapduration(Long capduration)
        Define the packet capture duration time. After the capture duration time, the capture process will stop working. format: int32
        Parameters:
        capduration - New value for the property.

      • setCapmode

        public PacketCaptureRequest.Builder setCapmode(String capmode)
        Possible values are:
        • PacketCaptureRequest.CAPMODE_STANDALONE
          • ,
        • PacketCaptureRequest.CAPMODE_STREAM
          • ,
        Define the capture streaming mode. The STREAM mode will send the data to given stream address and port. And the STANDALONE mode will save the capture file in local folder.
        Parameters:
        capmode - New value for the property.

        Parameters:

      • setStreamport

        public PacketCaptureRequest.Builder setStreamport(Long streamport)
        Set the stream port to receive the capture packet. The STREAM mode is based on GRE-in-UDP Encapsulation(RFC8086). Packets are sent to UDP port 4754. format: int32
        Parameters:
        streamport - New value for the property.
